body:
So, I've been really enjoying myself on youtube recently, uploading 3-4 times a week now, and I need some ideas for a video I'm planning. It's going to be an avicus challenges video, and I need some challenges from you guys in any gamemode. They can be pretty hard, but I don't want to spend 2 hours on one challenge, so make them somewhat reasonable :p 

My channel (Almost 100 subs :o): www.youtube.com/user/mklvr4
body_tagged:

My channel (Almost 100 subs :o): www.youtube.com/user/mklvr4
title: Avicus Challenges Video Ideas

replies.body:
Chalenges:
~10 kill streak on Nexus.
~360 no-scope on any gamemode.
~Win three matches in a row on Nebula.
~Get a triple kill with no armour on any gamemode.
~Win a walls map.
~Break all monuments on any map on Nebula
~Survive any thing more than a 3v1 on any gamemode/

These are just some challenges I've thought of on the spot, I'm sure there are many more!

replies.body:
Tier 1 challenge:
Break 1 monument on any multiple mon. map w/out dealing damage to any enemy (you have to let them kill you if they catch up to you, or you can try to lose them)

Tier 2 challenge:
Break both mons. on any double mon. Neb map, again w/out hitting anyone.

Tier 3 challenge:
Break all monuments on either Frostbite, or Quintus without hitting anyone.

Tier 3 challenge:
Break all monuments on either Frostbite, or Quintus without hitting anyone.

replies.body: Break a monument while on F5 mode, with the camera in front of you.
replies.body_tagged: Break a monument while on F5 mode, with the camera in front of you.

replies.body:
break a monument in 720p
and no black bars!!!!!!
replies.body_tagged:
break a monument in 720p
and no black bars!!!!!!

replies.body:
Some of them aren't really any challenges O.O
 3 vs 1 it full dia should be managable
Break all monuments in a map? what about dust devils?
win 3 matches:decent rushing and a bit of luck.


Personally:

Run into enemy spawn in nexus. the wait till the next due spawn and hit him 3 times with a gapple to get noticed. then escape back into your own spawn

replies.body:
Easy challenge: Break a monument on any map with an iron pickaxe.
Medium: Break a monument on any map with a stone pickaxe.
Hard: Break an monument on any map with a wooden pickaxe.

You can attack enemies, cover yourself e.t.c. just like normal gameplay.

HINTS:
Iron pickaxe: 42 seconds
Stone pickaxe: 70 seconds
Wooden pickaxe: 150 seconds

GOOD LUCK if you attempt these!
